description: This file defines a React context provider component 'AppStateProvider' that manages global application state for a dashboard, including fetching data from an API, managing themes, and periodic updates. It also provides a hook 'useAppState' for accessing this state.

methods.name: safeJsonParse
methods.description: Parses a JSON string safely, returning a fallback value on error.

methods.name: usePersistedTheme
methods.description: Custom hook to persist theme ('dark' or 'light') in localStorage and sync with document attribute.

methods.name: refreshAll
methods.description: Fetches and updates all dashboard datasets concurrently.

methods.name: startTest
methods.description: Starts a test suite and refreshes data.

methods.name: stopTest
methods.description: Stops the current test and refreshes data.
